content.prompt: Which of the following pieces of evidence did de Gaulle most directly use to support his skepticism regarding the EEC’s ability to unify Europe politically?

choices.label: The efficiency of the EEC’s bureaucracy
The idea only existing in myths, stories, and parades
The great authors being both European and representatives of their nations
The exclusion of other nations from the EEC

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
